Attribute.Name: Description
Attribute.Value:
Simulate temperature in a brewing cabinet.
Takes into account energy transfer to ambient air and to a brewing tank located inside the cabinet.

Signal.Description: Power dissipated to ambience. Negative if energy is transferred into cabinet.
Signal.Name: HeatLossPower

Parameter.Description: Speciifc heat capacity of air at working temperature.
Parameter.Name: HeatCapacityAir

Parameter.Description: Density of air at working temperature.
Parameter.Name: DensityAir

Parameter.Description: Insulation factor (R-value) of insulation of walls of cabinet.
Parameter.Name: InsulationFactor
